categories.label: Behavior & Diagnostics
categories.details: The Behavior Lab and Diagnostics division of the Mesa Hub is where hosts are brought to be trained, diagnosed, analyzed, and updated

requirements.label: The hosts should be diagnosticable
requirements.details: It is our duty to ensure that we can detect any issue affecting one of our host

tests.label: Motor functions can be freezed
tests.details: On command of a technician, a host should freeze all motor functions

requirements.label: The hosts should be emotionally stable
requirements.details: We should care about the emotions of our hosts in order to make sure that they can work properly.

tests.label: Hosts should not break from their role
tests.details: A host should also stay in character to perform its job

tests.label: Hosts should act as human beings
tests.details: Guests should not be able to identify that a hosts is an android

requirements.label: The hosts should work as expected
requirements.details: We have to make sure that our hosts are able to perform their role by having a functional body

tests.label: Hosts should be able to use their body as regular human beings
tests.details: They should be able to talk, walk, use tools and behave as regular human beings

requirements.label: The hosts should be repairable
requirements.details: In case of issue, we should be able to repair any possible damage affecting our hosts

tests.label: We should have spare parts
tests.details: Our spare parts storage should contain everything needed to repair hosts on a daily basis

tests.label: We should have facilities to repair hosts
tests.details: We should have enough room to store and repair our hosts

tests.label: Our staff should be trained
tests.details: Our technicians should be trained constantly to repair and update any given model

categories.label: Narrative & Design
categories.details: The Narrative and Design division of the Westworld Mesa Hub is headed by Lee Sizemore and is responsible for the creation of Narratives

requirements.label: The stories should be convincing
requirements.details: Our guests should not question anything in our stories

tests.label: Guests should not doubt our stories
tests.details: Our stories should not raise any doubts in the mind of our guests

tests.label: We should see good feedback on our stories
tests.details: Guests should only submit positive feedback on our stories

requirements.label: The stories should be engaging
requirements.details: Our stories should motivate our guests to complete them

tests.label: Our stories should be finishable
tests.details: Our guests should complete more than 80% of the stories that they start

tests.label: Our stories should be social events
tests.details: The introduction of a new story should be an event in social networks

requirements.label: The stories should be addictive
requirements.details: Our stories should always keep our guests on the edge to make them look for more

tests.label: Our guests should want to return to try new stories
tests.details: Our guests should want to spend more time in Westworld than in the real world, as such our guests should return at least 3 times per year to one of our parks

tests.label: Our guests should be ready to pay anything for our stories
tests.details: The unique experience that only us can deliver thanks to our park should make our guests be ready to pay anything for the chance to experience it

requirements.label: The environment should be coherent
requirements.details: Our environment are built to serve our stories, as such they should properly serve them

tests.label: Our guests should want to bring our park with them
tests.details: Our merchandising department should report at least $10.000 of gifts bought per guest

tests.label: Our guests should never want to leave our parks
tests.details: Our parks should be so immersive that at least 10% of our guests should be permanent residents

categories.label: Quality Assurance
categories.details: Quality Assurance (shortened to QA) is a division of Delos Destinations which oversees the standards and safety at Westworld and the other parks

requirements.label: The operation should be interruptible
requirements.details: In case of issue, we should be able to interrupt any ongoing story

tests.label: Our stories should be stoppable
tests.details: In case of emergency, any story should be stoppable in less than 10s anywhere in our parks

tests.label: Our stories should be restartable
tests.details: In case of issue, we should be able to give our guests the ability to restart a story at anytime

requirements.label: The guests should be retrievable
requirements.details: We should always be able to retrieve any endangered guests as soon as possible

tests.label: We should be able to evacuate our guests
tests.details: Some mean of transportation should be available to evacuate our guests in case of emergency

tests.label: We should be able to provide medical assistance
tests.details: A medical team should be on alert 24/7 to assist any guest

tests.label: We should be able to extract guests from the park
tests.details: In case of critical emergency, we should be able to dispatch our extraction team to the park

requirements.label: The parks should be monitored
requirements.details: In order to support the activities of the park, we should monitor it extensively to detect any issue

tests.label: We need to be able to detect potential issues
tests.details: A large set of cameras needs to work 24/7 to let us monitor our parks

tests.label: We need to be able to communicate with anybody in the park
tests.details: A park-wide communication system is needed to coordinate our teams and to communicate with quests
